statements: DELETE FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE team_id = 100 AND team_name = 'Marketing';
DELETE FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE efficiency_score > 90 OR productivity_score < 70;
DELETE FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE team_name = 'Marketing' AND date_recorded = '2022-08-30';
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 101 AND role = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM team_performance_metrics WHERE team_name = 'Marketing' AND date_recorded = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager' AND end_date > '2022-05-31';
